name: roster.No.
description: roster number of each player in this team
explanation:
the number where this player is at in the original
                  roster table

name: roster.Player
explanation: the name of each player in this team

name: roster.Pos
explanation:
the specific position for each player in this team, 
                  there are five types of positions, which are C, PF, SF,
                  SG, and PG

name: roster.Ht
explanation: the height of each player in the team in ft

name: roster.Wt
description: the weight of each player in this team
explanation: the weight of each player in the team in pounds

name: roster.Birth.Date
explanation: the birth date of each player in the team

name: roster.Country
explanation: the country that each player comes from in this team

name: roster.Exp
explanation:
the experience of playing basketball games for each player
                  in this team, unit is year

name: roster.College
explanation:
the name of college that each player in this team was
                  graduated from
